data.text: @DustinWhatley Lounging around sounds amazing for a weekend plan! Hope you have a relaxing 2-days!
@dan7126 Japan would have been wonderful but Niagara Falls is amazing just as well! Will you be visiting from the Canadian or NY side?
TGIF! What are you most looking forward to this weekend?
@GPNNOTICIASNEWS Thanks for your retweets! :) Have a great weekend!
@llaveable1 Thanks for coming on board with us! Hope you have a great trip out in LA! :)
What's playing on our AVOD system this month? Here's a brief list of what you can expect on our flight! #movies http://t.co/PbMLglV2MW
@MinOfSteel Hello Min Kyoo! Here's a brief list of what's to play this month. Bon voyage~! http://t.co/JfuxeFk5Sw
@findarf You should definitely try it out -- we look forward to having you on board soon! :)
@shirotama45 Great! Looking forward to serving you on board soon! :)
Rise and shine! Wouldn't you like to wake up in our First Suite on the JFK-ICN route? Available via flight OZ221/222! http://t.co/3a1doG2tGp
@KayeMendoza This only means you'll have to fly with us again soon! :)
Stretch out and relax in our First Suite cabins, now available on JFK-ICN routes via OZ221/222!  #Fi http://t.co/FuMYdd4XFm
@sryanpark213 Sounds like a great trip planned! Make sure to tweet us your flight experience! :)
@JoopHoop The link http://t.co/MtmSt0B1TN seems to be working on our end. If it does not work, you may write to customerus@flyasiana.com
Thanks for the photo! :) "@keeeseran: ASIANA AIRLINE...^^ http://t.co/lb3atP2uly"
Wanna get away? Escape to beautiful Bali via OZ763 for adventures or relaxation. (cc: http://t.co/owMEzaRynH) http://t.co/kjRJ0cJkhW
@GerritMC Hope you enjoyed your flight! :)
@Piccles101 Great to hear your flight was good! :) Thanks for coming on board with us and hope to see you again soon!
A beautiful shot at CDG! Thanks theflyingfrenchboy #regram #repost #asianaairlines #cdg http://t.co/yWjREiv9Go
@DJKim0701 There's a rebate for Asiana ticket purchases once a year, depending on the credit card you have~ :)
Want to rack up Asiana Club mileage fast? Sign up for an Asiana Bank of America credit card today. For more info: http://t.co/gnY2WsPBOk
@vasujain That doesn't sound good. Could you DM us your Asiana Club # so that we can check on the status? Thank you!
Are you at #GBTA2013? Come find us at the Star Alliance booth!
@7TeaTime7 Thanks for the retweets!
@CyrielleELF Awesome! That's a few months away, but welcome aboard!
@wildanathar_ If you're on our flight, you can keep the copy of the issue!
@LaurieFleming Welcome aboard! :) Hope you have a great week!
Good morning and happy Monday! Any plans to travel this week?
@llaveable1 Welcome aboard! :) Hope you have a great week!
It's only the second day of August, but have you flipped through this month's issue of ASIANA In-flight magazine? http://t.co/mtdQ8oxAf0
@DecRoutes Following! :)
TGIF! Sending a little love to all of our followers today! Any plans for the weekend? #love #hearts… http://t.co/T4rnBgXHDE
RT @BizTravelerNA: @AsianaAirlines opens new hangar at Incheon International Airport: http://t.co/s8clCYgDk8. #BizTravel #Airlines #Travel
@Histerius Thanks for the #FF! TGIF and have a great weekend! :)
@marvell_putra Thank you for the warm welcome! :) We're glad to be able to serve these Indonesian destinations!
Become a member of Asiana Club and earn miles on eligible Star Alliance flights! #AsianaAirlines #As http://t.co/EQodHq95GS
@ThriftyTourist There is no set date as of yet, but it's in the works, so keep an eye out for it! :)
@dkelly1110 Thank you for the kind compliments! :)
Wanna know what First Suite on our JFK-ICN route is like? Check out this great video we found on YouTube: http://t.co/Vj9TL14GBf
Today, Incheon International Airport opens up Asiana Airlines' 2nd aircraft  hangar, the largest… http://t.co/cGtISLQat2
@cecicano77 Thanks for tweeting us our little mascot! :) Did you know that is our old logo?
Good morning, Tweeps! Here's a photo to start the day from @AnaKoodai at ICN: https://t.co/OyVDxTBkDH Happy #HumpDay!
Get the ASIANA in-flight magazine app, available on iPad (http://t.co/Yg1G32ACZD) & Android (http://t.co/EXMLmyyKiy)! http://t.co/TCcN4W1Rbh
@phodan7 Hope your flight was enjoyable! Home, sweet home! :)
@CarpeDingo Thanks! Looking forward to welcoming you on board! :) Have a great week!
Hungry? Try our bibimbap! Thanks @jettfrogg #regram #inflight #food #bibimbap #asianaairlines http://t.co/Oyvefn6jo2
@jettfrogg MMmM It sure looks delicious! :) Thanks for sharing the photo!
Tea, anyone? #regram #teaservice #asianaairlines Thank you timothywgo http://t.co/qqE75vvueL
@victorology Yes, we operate flights twice a week to DPS! Hope to see you on board!
We hope you enjoyed your flight with us! :) RT @abbitravels: @AsianaAirlines #ICN to #LHR I'm coming home! http://t.co/JzcSPNb4Ot
Stay at Okura Hotels & Resorts on your next vacation for bonus miles on Asiana Club! More info http://t.co/1yF1qgeTYG http://t.co/7nntlS41rw
@daboogah Thank you for welcoming us back with open arms! :) Have a great weekend!
@CarlBrandt Do you have any photos of Kuta? We'd love to see them if you do! :)
@HumamDawa13 Hello and thank you! :) Hope to see you on board!
@BTAsiaPacific Thank you for the kind greetings! :)
@rmujana Thank you! :) Have a great weekend!
Fly away to Bali (DPS) with your loved ones. What a dream destination! :) #travel #asianaairlines #bali #Paradise http://t.co/p8QgC8epZs
We are now operating the DPS (Denpasar/Bali) - ICN (Incheon/Seoul) route twice a week via OZ 763/764. http://t.co/HeTEoZogfw
@PointsToPointB Great! Thanks for participating! Keep on the lookout for future events as we may be giving away aircraft models. ;)
Privacy. #FirstSuite #jfk #newyork #asianaairlines http://t.co/lnHA0QrVvf
@daniel_sharrie @PointsToPointB @Romsdeals @LindsayAlter Thanks for the RT! Please check your DM for further info.
MLB lovers! Are you a fan of the Dodgers or Reds? We're giving away 4 pairs of tix to Sunday's game in Los Angeles. RT for a chance to win.
Our flights to Jakarta (CGK) have kicked off last week. Catch a flight daily from ICN via OZ761/762! For more info: http://t.co/Gf9rSWuTnX
New York! The OZ First Suite has officially launched for the JFK-ICN route. Sweet dreams. :) http://t.co/EnoVCR9UrS
@Histerius Thank you! Hope you have a wonderful Tuesday!
@sjmagsis Hello! What city will you be departing from and what date?
@love_summer_sky We apologize for any inconvenience. Please DM us with details so that we may assist you further.
@PIERPAOLOMONNI Hello and thank you! Hope you have a great week! :)
@caleboluochouma Thank you. Hope you have a great week!
@luisevanegas Thank you! Hope you have a good week as well! :)
Hello Asiana followers! Thanks for all your concerns & well wishes these past few weeks. We'll start to tweet news & updates again soon! :)
E-mail availale for passengers and family of OZ214 accident. US: tecus@flyasiana.com / KR: teckr@flyasiana.com / CN: teccn@flyasiana.com
US toll-free number will be changed. US: 855-422-7214 (until July 12,2013) → 866-528-8241 (Starting July 13,2013)
We have additional toll-free numbers for passengers and family: US: 866-528-8241  / KR: 080-233-4000 / CN: 400-650-8905
Updated statements from 7/9/13 Press Conf. available: http://t.co/GQaIvGBJDa, Google+ http://t.co/dxx5vRELZH #SFO #AsianaAirlines #OZ214
New updates from Press Conference listed on our website: http://t.co/tGONgb4s36 // Or read it on Google+ http://t.co/CtoffkV8Ri
Statement from the July 8th Press Conference on OZ214 Accident: http://t.co/g4WmdwPahj
[ATTN] New contact # for any inquiries regarding the incident of flight OZ214 on Sat. 07/06. Please contact 1-855-422-7214. Thank you.
The following is a link to our official news and updates on our website: http://t.co/S9YdRbwqos
[ATTN] Passengers originally scheduled for 06JUL OZ213 are re-scheduled for Sunday, 07JUL OZ2134 departing at 9AM. Please call 800-227-4262
We've posted our press release on most of our social media platforms. Here's the official release on our website: http://t.co/MKhQf6FS44
Here's an official press release: https://t.co/pbIPKHCvPY. For further information regarding OZ213/214, please contact 800-227-4262.
Our thoughts and prayers are with all the passengers, and flight crew on the flight. We hope to provide you with further info asap.
Thank you for your concern and support at this time. We are currently investigating and will update with news as soon as possible. #SFO
Good morning, Tweeps! Happy 4th of July! :)
Where were you off to? "@kapibarachichi: @AsianaAirlines http://t.co/bQKvU22A2U"
The view from San Francisco's Twin Peaks is breathtaking! #SFO #asianaairlines #travel http://t.co/b9Duklcsn6
Will you be on board with us this month? Here's a preview of what will be playing on our AVOD system! Enjoy! http://t.co/99MMMx2vTx
@bmartray We're working on getting the list up on our global website, but here's a selection of what will be playing! http://t.co/PqA6doo7Ni
@muhamadirfn Unfortunately, you have to mail in the originals.
@muhamadirfn For further information, you may contact (800)227-4262. Please make sure the flight hasn't exceeded 1 year.
@muhamadirfn If you're a member of Asiana Club and flew with Qatar, you must mail in original boarding passes and e-ticket to our office..
@NonRevAdventure Looks like a great stop after a long day at work! :)
@iesphotos That's a beautiful photo! So many lights! :D
Anybody have any travel photos they'd like to share? :) #traveltuesday
CHEERS to the 2nd half of 2013!   #Hello #July! #travel #asianaairlines #wings #airplanes #sky #clou http://t.co/nApJpcIHgw
Hello July! :) Here's to the start of the second half of 2013! #july #hello #summer #fly #travel… http://t.co/FksXKvEr1F
@dnristiati Welcome aboard! :)
Our winner for the Shin-Soo Choo ball goes to @TimToolman1958, and @hk0741 has been selected to win the Hyun-Jin Ryu ball! :) Congrats!
It's already July, and that means several things: JFK-ICN will fly the new OZ First Suite, and we will start flying to Jakarta & Bali!
